title: What is Ternio? - Quora
tags: English Word Definitions, Terminology, and Jargon

response.answer_text: Ternio provides a verifiable and decentralized asset that empowers advertisers to verify spend through each intermediary and gives publishers the assurance and guarentee of being paid on delivery.
